name: rEVOLVING CANNONS
description:
Embark on a journey where you should travel as long as you possibly can, having a limited amount of cannons. Evolve as an adventurer in your skill to shoot precisely. 

Main features:

* Procedurally generated levels

* Global leaderboard system

 * Cinematic camera

* Hardcore limited amount of cannons

I'd be happy to see your opinion in comments about this game!
